name: The Ryesing
description:
In a moldy basement, lost to time, an old loafer reflects on a wasted life. With the mistakes he's made scattered around all around him, he wonders: can a crusty old fool really turn over a new leaf? Will his old friends form the trail of breadcrumbs that will lead him to redemption... or is this just how the cookie crumbles?

Credits

Directed & developed by John Gabriel
3D models by Vela
Composed by Trevor Hamer
Casting by Sandra "Maxi" Molina
Narrated by Kameron Watson
Icons by Font Awesome
Stock footage by Kamus Production and Mixkit
Additional 3D models by Orlando Vallés, Tom Hodes and Rigsters
Additional music by bandersn4tch

The Ryesing was made for the thirty-eighth Godot Wild Jam.
